section.heading: Practice in court.
section.text: Unless specifically provided to the contrary in this chapter or inconsistent with its provisions, the rules of the court, including the rules concerning vacation of orders and appellate review, govern proceedings under this chapter.

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 1-304 of the Uniform Guardianship and Protective Proceedings Act (1982 Act).
